headline: Is Linde (LIN) a Safe Bet for Dividend Investors Seeking Industrial Exposure?
summary: Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) is included among the Top 10 Safest Dividend Stocks in the UK. Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) has created a range of technologies aimed at efficiently compressing and safely refueling hydrogen, along with solutions that help reduce the carbon footprint of hydrogen through carbon capture and storage methods.
